actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to broaden the coverage of home health service and post-hospital home health services under the medicare program.

summary.text: Extends the coverage of home health services and posthospital home health services under the medicare program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to broaden the coverage of home health service and post-hospital home health services under the medicare program.
